name: ORE.v1
description:
READ BEFORE YOU PLAY :)

if u played on mobile phones  Make sure your mobile phone is in landscape and check your game screen because the game can't be zoomed out, guys

if the game cannot be restarted or rebooted, please click or tap "HOME" Then click or tap "GAME"

Intinyaaa klo kamu maen di hp kentangmu wkwk pastikan mobile phone mu dalam keadaan landscape dan periksa layar game kamu karena game tidak bisa di zoom out guys :)

jika game tidak bisa di restart atau ngebug silahkan klik atau tap "HOME" Kemudian klik atau tap "GAME"
